display_name: [Red and Blue Light Orbs] Jeice & Burter

kit.leader_skill: "Space-Traveling Warriors" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +150%

super_attack.name: Purple Comet Crash (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Raises allies' ATK & DEF by 20% for 1 turn

passive_skill.name: Impenetrable Elite Force
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; (Forever) Great chance of evading enemy's attack; (Forever) "Space-Traveling Warriors" or "Special Pose" Category allies' Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 40% up; For every attack performed: (Forever) ATK & DEF 50% up (up to 200%); When receiving a Super Attack: Chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up temporarily; When there is an ally whose name includes "Ginyu" attacking in the same turn: Chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up within the turn before receiving an attack; All allies' ATK & DEF 30% up for 2 turns

lines.text: ATK & DEF 200% up
Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack
Great chance of evading enemy's attack
"Space-Traveling Warriors" or "Special Pose" Category allies' Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 40% up
ATK & DEF 50% up (up to 200%)
lines.context: For every attack performed

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up temporarily
lines.context: When receiving a Super Attack

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up within the turn before receiving an attack
lines.context: When there is an ally whose name includes "Ginyu" attacking in the same turn

lines.text: All allies' ATK & DEF 30% up for 2 turns
lines.context: When there is an ally whose name includes "Ginyu" attacking in the same turn
